name: Saiku's Endless Labyrinth
description:
"..."
"..."
"..."
"Where am I?"
"Why am I so cold?"

"Get up Saiku."

---

Welcome to Saiku's Endless Labyrinth, the first game to be published by Lone Lexi The Slow Game Dev!

Follow Saiku's journey through the world as they battle monsters, encounter great bosses and traverse strange lands. With the help of PEROS, an operator from S.A.V.E. Corp., Saiku must seek out the meaning to their life and attempt to recover their memories...

Features:
- RPG gameplay and battle system
- Diverse game zones
- Unique characters and dialogue
- Well-paced, engaging story progression
developers: Lone Lexi The Slow Game Dev
publishers: Lone Lexi The Slow Game Dev
